The buildings are predominantly white and gray, typical of many cityscapes. The street itself is lined with power lines and street lamps, adding to the urban feel. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue sky and the gray and white of the buildings. The image does not provide any specific details that could be used to identify the exact location of this street in Beijing.
